entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets before morning. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
